Key Match Events: LeBron James recorded 39 points, seven rebounds, and six assists.
Cam Reddish had his best game of the season with 15 points, six rebounds, two assists, and two steals.
Jaren Jackson Jr. and Ja Morant both scored 20 points each.
The Grizzlies' bench outscored the Lakers' bench 52-33.
Pre-Game Insights: Anthony Davis did not participate in the game due to a left heel injury.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win.
